sentences.en: A gaudy or showy ornament or trinket.
From there you must trinket his fear asas it lands ( the IOTH mod helps greatly ).
sentences.cn: 从这里开始,你必须马上解掉施你身上的恐惧.
他给她买了些不值钱的珠宝.

sentences.en: Heathcliff had opened the trinket and cast out its contents, replacing them by a black lock of his own.
sentences.cn: 希刺克厉夫把这小装饰品打开了，把里面的东西扔出来，装进他自己的一绺黑发。

sentences.en: I will carry no more. Find your trinket upon the ground.
sentences.cn: 艾德温:我带不了那么多东西, 自己到地上捡.

sentences.en: If he already blew his PVP trinket and your have a full energy stunlock ready.
sentences.cn: 如果他已经用过了PVP饰品,而且你有着准备好的满能量连续技.

sentences.en: It difficult to do enough damage via stun and they have trinket to break it anyway.
sentences.cn: 而且通过晕技做的伤害不够,他们也可以用耳环来破掉晕.
那些饰品在这里毫无用处.

sentences.en: We have a trinket, as does every other class.
sentences.cn: 是的,我们有徽章, 可是我靠其他职业一样都有.

words.tran_cn: 小装饰品；不值钱的小玩意儿

trans.tran_cn: 小装饰品， 小件饰物，无价值的琐细杂物，小玩意儿
